profile.name: Dr. Jeshua Tromp
profile.title: Cognitive Neuroscientist | Gut-Microbiome-Brain Interaction | Cognitive Control & Attention
profile.bio: Cognitive Neuroscientist with a background in psychology and neuroscience. Passionate about understanding the gut-brain axis and its implications for cognitive control and attention.

projects.title: Postdoc project: Gut-microbiome-brain axis
projects.description: Investigate the link between the gut microbiome and brain function, focusing on how gut bacteria influence brain health and cognitive processes. Funded by the Hereditary project

projects.title: PhD thesis: Neuromodulation of cognitive control
projects.description: Investigate the role of neuromodulators in cognitive control processes, including attention and decision-making. Funded by the NWO

projects.title: Hersenvoer
projects.description: Dutch blog about issues in science and health, with a focus on neuroscience and psychology. Funded by my coffee machine
